name: The Divine Spell-bow (Sorcerer 26 / Paladin 4 / Arcane Archer 10)
author: Orion

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
My quest continues for a build in which half-elf is the most optimal! 

Here's a build idea I concocted whilst I was playing WoG as a sorceress. 

The spells I noted were good but I seemed to spend an inordinate amount of time shooting them with my crossbow with my summons tanking.... to save spells against so called 'grunts'

Wouldn't mind it if I could hit em more often... hmmm... more AB would be nice... arcane archer? would be nice...

I got a high charisma stat why not divine might for some added divine damage...

Anyway this spell lady (I always think the sorcerer class as sorceresses for some reason) has 
- an base AB of 40 (ranged AB of 27 at level 20, good stuff, I've met the target for spellswords!)
- up to 6 attacks / round with haste and rapid shot
- Caster level 26 with full sorcerer spell book / base Cha 26, undispellable apart from Mords/Breaches hooray!
- around 300hp, Epic Warding/EMA
- Extend Spell/Empower Spell
- Nice saves (F32 / W26 R33) in case you do get your Lesser Mind Blank Morded for example...

Stuff I wish I could fit:
- Blind fight
- Craft wand or scribe scroll 
- Called Shot (although I dont have a lot of spare AB, maybe this is ok but could be dropped)
- Maximise spell (for Maximised IGMS for example - more of those heatseeking missiles the better I guess)
- Wouldn't mind AA getting to 13 just to penetrate premonition (I think its +6?) but I think I'd have to drop Divine Might or Sorc levels 

Stuff I'm not sure about:
- Spell penetration feats - dunno if I need them

Anyway what do you think?
SpoilerSorcerer(26), Paladin(4), Arcane Archer(10), Half-Elf STR: 13 CON: 11 (12) INT: 10 01: Sorcerer(1): Point Blank Shot 03: Sorcerer(2): Power Attack 05: Sorcerer(3) 07: Sorcerer(4) 09: Sorcerer(6): Weapon Focus: Shortbow 11: Arcane Archer(2) 13: Arcane Archer(4) 15: Arcane Archer(6): Rapid Shot 17: Arcane Archer(8) 19: Arcane Archer(10) 21: Sorcerer(7): Epic Weapon Focus: Shortbow 23: Sorcerer(9) 25: Sorcerer(11) 27: Sorcerer(13): Great Dexterity I, (DEX=20) 29: Sorcerer(15) 31: Sorcerer(17) 33: Sorcerer(19): Great Charisma II, (CHA=22) 35: Sorcerer(21) 37: Sorcerer(23): Epic Spell: Epic Warding 39: Sorcerer(25): Great Charisma III, (CHA=24) Skillpoints: 106 Saving Throw bonuses: Spells: +8, Mind Effects: +2 AB (max, naked): 28 (melee), 40 (ranged) Spell Casting: Sorcerer(9) 01: Concentration(4), Open Lock(1), Search(1),  03: Concentration(1), Search(1),  05: Concentration(1), Search(1),  07: Concentration(1), Search(1),  09: Concentration(1), Search(1),  11: Search(1), Save(6),  13: Search(1), Save(12),  15: Search(1), Save(18),  17: Search(1), Save(24),  19: Save(32),  21: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(24),  23: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  25: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  27: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  29: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  31: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  33: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  35: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  37: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),  39: Concentration(1), Spellcraft(1),

posts.author: gkorjax
posts.content:
Methinks you were a bit tired when you posted this...you've not posted your in depth breakdown in the standard format..

From what I've done with these builds, is often a little bit of a trade off...getting those arcane archer levels in for the boosts to ab, while also leveling up sorcerer for the tensers/other buffs.

I forget if this is similar to the divine howitzer build or not.

Btw. I am not sure if there are other reasons, but its level 24 to be actually undispellable.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Lol gkorjax

Thanks for pointing that out that in my excitement I forgot to post the build

Duh! :) Anyway fixed it by editing the main post.

I searched the ECB Archive search engine RE Sorcerer / Paladin / AA builds:

Correllon's Spear arcane archer 15 / paladin 4 / sorcerer 21 (elf) by Mithdradates
Divine Strike Bowman paladin 5 / sorcerer 5 / arcane archer 30 (elf?) by King Ubu
Moon Knight of Corellon paladin 16 / sorcerer 1 / arcane archer 23 (half-elf) by grizzled_dwarflord
Divination Archer sorcerer 8 / paladin 4 / arcane archer 28 (elf) by HolyBeef

Searched ECB Archive search engine RE Sorcerer / Cleric / AA builds: 

Holy Archer sorcerer 1 / cleric 17 / arcane archer 22 (half-elf) by kreestopearq

No Sorcerer / Blackguard / AA builds in ECB archives

So should be unique and new and fresh, unless someone has posted something like this in the Tapatalk forum!

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
You may just as well go wizard rather than sorcerer if AA is the main class, even if the focus of the build is on charisma and Divine might.
Low level wizards can learn all low level spells while low level sorcerers only get more spell slots from charisma. The boost to saves will come from paladin or blackguard anyway.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Thanks Mick for the feedback

I presumed you mean wizard is more powerful here because the four wizard bonus feats between levels 1-20, a number of them could be taken as great intelligence?

Anyway they say faith is powerful. That is believing in something without fully understanding!

So I took faith in my ECB colleague and redid the build and  this is what it looks like as a elven wizard AA paladin, it has 1 less AB, but gets 140 more skill points  which can be used to pump a number of skills up nicely plus the glorious keen senses... it certainly looks a LOT stronger... plus a lot of modules will have elf special things available to them... just the spell DCs will be lower which may or may not be important...

I even included taunt (lol) in case that is useful whilst you are in iron golem or red dragon form with the Shapechange spell...

Thanks so much again. Sad for the half-elf race :(...

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Sorry Orion, I was not quite clear about what I was talking about.
I was thinking of wizard vs sorcerer in a build with arcane caster as a minor class, eg 1-5 levels.
I saw some builds listed with very low sorcerer and was thinking that you could find more of them if you expanded your search to wizard as well.
An archer build with wizard or sorcerer as major class is something I never have tested.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
No problems I can see how wizard is superior as a minor class
Its probably superior as a major class but game play testing is probably needed
Thanks for the feedback. 

Anyway searching for major class arcane spell casters with AA and divine damage:

Here are the builds for wizard / paladin / AA in the ECB archives

Spoiler The Divine Howitzer paladin 10 / wizard 1 / arcane archer 29 (elf) by grizzled_dwarflord Eldritch Archer Divine wizard 17 / arcane archer 19 / paladin 4 (elf) by Cinnabar Din

Here are 'Red Mage' (Cleric/Wizard) AAs

Spoiler Mystra's Bow cleric 23 / arcane archer 15 / wizard 2 (elf) by Nimueh_Leafbow (CLC 15/WIZ 1/AA 24) cleric 15 / wizard 1 / arcane archer 24 (elf) by Dwarf22 (CLC 26/WIZ 1/AA 13) cleric 26 / wizard 1 / arcane archer 13 (elf?) by S-Priest Norse Archer (Cleric of Loki) wizard 1 / cleric 26 / arcane archer 13 (elf) by TyrTemplar Mystic Archer wizard 23 / cleric 12 / arcane archer 5 (elf) by CrispyCritter

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Look for Bard Blackguard AA!
But they are more archers than casters.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Refined the Sorcerer / Paladin / AA combo a bit more

Base Cha 30 (for more spells, Spell DC, divine damage), Base AB 38, up to 6 attacks a round with Rapid Shot / Haste

Swapped Empower Spell for Craft Wand but in a non-rest restricted environment Empower spell is stronger

Put Int up to 12 for a cross class Tumble Dump, always handy to have Tumble as an archer I think...

I'll start play testing this shortly. Could use shortbow or longbow depending on preference. There are much better shortbows for sale in WoG so I chose that

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Quick update with this lass

Got her to level 9 with a Sorcerer 6 / Paladin 3 split on WoG to access the haste spell.

Things are working quite well. Playing mostly as an archer who can self buff a little. 

Got a few +Cha items for extra divine damage and duration with divine might. Doubling or tripling damage output on basic arrows is pretty nice, although more Cha ideally is desirable for a longer duration so one can keep shooting

WoG allows one to cast magic / greater magic weapon on bows and arrows which is quite nice, as is flame weapon on arrows. On other servers one could cast Bull's Strength or Eagle's splendor for extra Str damage from mighty / Divine damage. Boots of Traveling allow for some very cheesy outdoor kiting strategies against melee opponents. If you can't hit them there is always a wand of missiles. I think hitting them will no longer be a problem once the Arcane Archer levels get pumped up a little.

Will continue play testing, I have a feeling this will be quite a nice build to play and things will only get better once the sorcerer levels get pumped up further epic levels.

posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
Used to be a shortbow that had perma-haste.    Made a real nice toy for an archer build.  At one point it was removed, but that might have been the 1.69 server.  Not sure if it still exists in the EE WoG.

I'll definitely have to check that out though.  Would make this build almost level itself.

Got to love a spellsword that doesnt use a sword  :)

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Mmmm I have such a bow on some of my characters on EE WoG :)
That is why I chose shortbow 
one of the older players has taught me there is also a permahaste longbow too, not sure if that was a new or old drop though
that being said a 6 socketed bow is gonna be best
equipped with say a chainmail of speed or something :)

or just not bother, cast extended haste and be done with it :) [recommended]

posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content: finding said six socketed bow is the hard part....  I think the only six socket item i've ever found was a greatsword..   and that was many moons ago... and I think i was stupid and sold it....  or fed it to an electrifier
